m-bot.name: Server ID
m-bot.info: The ID of the server that will control the bot.

m-bot.name: Category ID
m-bot.info: The ID of the category each session will be controlled in.

m-options.name: Require admin
m-options.info: Requires Ryugyong to have admin privileges to run.

m-options.name: Prompt admin
m-options.info: Triggers the User Account Control prompt to run Ryugyong as admin.

m-options.name: Force admin
m-options.info: Continuously triggers the User Account Control prompt until the user accepts.

m-options.name: Continue without admin
m-options.info: If the user declines the Account Control prompt while "Require admin" is enabled, Ryugyong will still run.

m-options.name: Use mutex
m-options.info: Whether to use a mutex to ensure only 1 instance of Ryugyong is running.

m-options.name: Mutex name
m-options.info: The name of the mutex. If one is not provided, a random one will be generated.

m-options.name: Persistence method
m-options.info: How Ryugyong will persist through device restarts.

m-options.name: Better persistence when admin
m-options.info: Whether Ryugyong will use a better persistence method when it has admin privileges.

m-options.name: Tracking ID
m-options.info: A custom ID/code to help you keep track of this build.

m-setup.name: Use custom directory
m-setup.info: Installs Ryugyong to a custom directory. If unchecked, Ryugyong will install to the music folder or windows folder if it has admin privileges.

m-setup.name: Custom directory path
m-setup.info: The path of the directory. Use "<USERPROFILE>" for the user profile directory or "<USER>" for the device's username.

m-setup.name: Use custom name
m-setup.info: Rename Ryugyong to a custom name. If unchecked, Ryugyong will set its name to "svchost" on Windows 11 or "conhost" on Windows 10.

m-setup.name: Custom name
m-setup.info: The name Ryugyong will rename itself to.

m-protection.name: Check username
m-protection.info: Checks if the device's username is a common VM username.

m-protection.name: Check desktop file names
m-protection.info: Checks if over 80% of the files on the desktop have fully uppercase names.

d-options.name: Upload Ryugyong file
d-options.info: Uploads the Ryugyong build zip file to catbox so only the dropper file is shipped.

d-options.name: Custom URL
d-options.info: A custom URL of a already uploaded Ryugyong, it has to match the below option. "Upload Ryugyong file" cannot be enabled to be enabled or this URLl will be overwritten.

d-options.name: Encrypt Ryugyong file
d-options.info: Encrypts the Ryugyong build zip file.

d-protection.name: Check username
d-protection.info: Checks if the device's username is a common VM username.

d-protection.name: Check desktop file names
d-protection.info: Checks if over 80% of the files on the desktop have fully uppercase names.

z-settings.name: Clean Ryugyong build
z-settings.info: Cleans the main Ryugyong build before building it.

z-settings.name: Self contain Ryugyong build
z-settings.info: Bundles the .NET runtime with the Ryugyong build.

z-settings.name: Build single file
z-settings.info: Builds Ryugyong as a single executable.

z-settings.name: Clean dropper build
z-settings.info: Cleans the dropper build before building it.

z-settings.name: Statically link dropper
z-settings.info: Statically links the required libraries with the dropper.

z-settings.name: Build as
z-settings.info: How the final build will be built as.
